item.title: Report E-2025040093
item.description:
Report E-2025040093

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-07
  • City: MONROE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 07:45 EST, ERTS was contacted by XPO Logistics (LMO) about a cargo release. It was reported that due to improper loading, approximately 10 gallons of 3.5 VOC Medium Gloss Black Coating (hazardous - UN1263) was released. The caller stated that the released product was contained to the trailer floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning the release donning the proper PPE per SDS. The released product, and oil-dri will be placed into a 65-gallon poly drum. The damaged drum with waste product will be placed into an 85-gallon poly drum and staged in OS&D. There were no drains, soils or waterways reported to have been impacted by the release.
